<h1>Overview</h1>

<p>The information and protocols on this website are arranged under four broad sections which are accessible by clicking on the links on the top menu bar or on the titles of the boxes below. We aim to update this site as the development of the approach progresses and the number of applications increase. The aim is to enable any laboratory with basic parasitology and molecular biology capacity to undertake the approach.</p>
